page.title: 02SOUTH HANTS STRUCTURE PLAN 1
page.content:
SOUTH HAMPSHIRE IS A MAJOR GROWTH AREA OF THE COUNTRY. EACH YEAR,FOR VARIOUS REASONS,MANY MORE PEOPLE ARE LIVING IN SOUTH HAMPSHIRE. A PLAN WAS DRAWN UP FOR THE AREA TO ENSURE THAT NECESSITIES AND AMENITIES ARE AVAILABLE WHEN AND WHERE REQUIRED. ALSO,IT WAS ESSENTIAL TO CONTROL THE GROWTH. SERIOUS PROBLEMS EXIST IN THE AREA,INCLUDING SEVERE TRAFFIC CONGESTION,AREAS OF OLD AND LOW CLASS HOUSING AND INADEQUATE DRAINAGE SYSTEMS.AREAS OF VALUABLE COUNTRYSIDE ALSO EXIST,AND ARE POTENTIALLY AT RISK IF GROWTH IS NOT PLANNED.
FORECASTS FOR SOUTH HAMPSHIRE:_
1966 1991 POPULATION 818,000 1,161,000 NO. OF CARS 145,000 473,000
